resources.string:
2017.11.01-RC:
 · New: Coordinate calculator (New Waypoint - Calculate Coordinates)
 · New: Log image upload for Opencaching
 · New: Detect certitude as checker and support opening it via menu
 · New: Show as list menu now only active if more than one cache is on map
 · New: Support OpenCaching GPX format extensions
 · Fix: Improve parsing of home coordinates
 · Fix: Disabled caches might be shown with truncated title
 · Fix: Some OC cache URL not detected correctly
 · Fix: Some possible crashes on map
 · Fix: Search caches by users with a '+' in the name
 · Fix: Correctly display pictures with relative URLS
 · Fix: Disable phone number linking in personal note field
 · Fix: Possible crash when starting directory selection
 · Fix: Improved detection of dark text to allow contrast improvement
 · Fix: Improve creation of nomedia file in geocache data directories
